Text: When I try to play this in Windows Media Player, it says that it has DRM and asks me if I want to acquire the rights for it. Unless someone can point out how to circumvent this, I wouldn't download this torrent if I were you.
Actually, after examining the file numbers, it looks like my comment refers to a different torrent for this file. So, this one might be fine.
OK, I definitely had a different torrent before. My apologies, I've found Rabiner to be very reliable in the past so I should have checked more carefully before posting.
